name: Mental Math Mayhem
description:
Hi all.

This is my first project, I made it within a few hours of a self hosted Game Jam. I have other projects that I have been working on but it was important to myself to just "release" something out in the public after seeing so many great people on the Game Maker Discord.

I wish to make games that are educational but fun much like the Toddler Mobile App games are for Toddler age, I wish to do a similar set of Games for older folks that have life long benefits.

That's the mission, forgive the rough edges, I will continue to improve and listen to feedback wherever and however it is given.
